reviews.review:
Довольно простая, но забавная игра. Очень короткая,это расстраивает =(
8 порталов из 10.

Beynin sınırlarını zorlayan bir oyun. Fakat çok kısa. 1.5 saatte oyunun tamamını bitirdim. Puzzle tarzı oyunları seviyorsanız şiddetle almanızı öneririm. Ben Portal 2 ile birlikte bundle şeklinde aldım ve diğer oyunu oynamak için sabırsızlanıyorum. Almanızı kesinlikle tavsiye ederim!

Un petit bijou.
Qui se termine très vite, mais après tout pourquoi pas.
Ca commence comme un tutoriel, et dérive de plus en plus comme une parodie de tutoriel, dans la mesure où le boss final est la voix même du tutoriel!
Enormément d'humour, un concept simple mais qui retourne bien la tête au tout début.
J'aime aussi le fait que le jeu revête l'apparence d'un fps, pour devenir au final l'inverse, à savoir un jeu d'énigme.
Mais le gameplay bien fouillé changera aussi les possibilités pour le transformer par moments en jeu de plate-formes.
Riche, inventif, drôle et renverse les codes habituels des jeux vidéos. Merci! 10/10

[spoiler]The cake is a lie :)[/spoiler]
Hikayesi gerçekten çok güzel kesinlikle alıp oynayın pişman olmazsınız.
Must play

"The cake is a lie"

I like the quote, I love the game.

9,5/10

It's Portal.

Enough said.
Its a great game play it now
Love a first person shooter that breaks out of the mold of shooting endless zombies and makes you think.
Ta gra nie ma zadnego sensu c: mogłaby być Multiplayer

Was a bit late to the party on this game, which came out back in 2007. Got it on the Summer Sale 2017, and I didn't regret it! Portal is a fun and intriguing puzzle game where the test chambers gets harder to pass with each level (the first levels are pretty easy, but are gradually becoming harder to pass as you progress through them). 

The game is fairly short and takes about 5 hours to beat.

The end credits is amazing. 10/10. 

And remember, the cake is a lie.
good
the cake is a lie
Motion sickness 10/10 puke edition
Cool game makes much fun but a bit short

It took me two hours to finish it, but I had fun solving the puzzels.
I bought it on steam sale for a good price and it's okay for two hours playtime.
I would not recommend it for the full price, but in sale it's a must buy!

Zamanın ötesinde bir oyun , indirimde ve oynamadıysanız kesinlikle almalısınız. Şimdi 2. defa bitirmeye gidiyorum.

Portal is an old game by Valve, but it is still nice to play it!
To pass the different levels you need reflexion and patience, as you have to invest some time to achieve a level.
The graphics are still good looking today, even after years.
I like a lot the Story, especially in the last level, with the CAKE (it's a lie, if you didn't realize it). 
In final, I really enjoyed playing this game.
Good game ! I reccomend it !

멀미는 별로 나진 않았는데 포탈을 이용해서 장소를 빠져나가는 몇몇 방법이 굉장히 변태같다.

방에서 애쓰다가 빠져나오면서 기쁘기보단 욕하면서 나오게된다.

근데 재밌어서 금방 보스까지 갔다.

이 겜에서 젤 좋았던 부분은 엔딩 크래딧 부분.

노래가 너무 좋았다.

포탈 2가 굉장히 기대된다.

9/10，少的一分是怕Valve骄傲
花了一下午时间通关，无论剧情还是音乐都引人入胜，操作感良好，不过有些时候玩着会比较晕。关卡难度设计的还算合理吧，没有卡关很久的情况，看来开发者是下了大功夫的，值得肯定。
最后还有，GLaDOS真是太可爱了ww
Primera vez que me paso el juego de manera legal :D, no creo que pueda aportar algo diferente a lo que ya está dicho, una MARAVILLA de juego de puzzles.
Good game

我一直考虑决定是买portal1还是买valve completed pack，我最终看了微信钱包，我才决定去买portal以及另外三款游戏，都是valve公司的。这是我期末考试完之后玩的最棒的游戏，尽管我才玩了0.8小时。

1.画质能在07年做得这么好，给个赞，毕竟我现在在玩，另外我买的Portal Bundle。
2.尽管是科幻游戏，但是我喜欢用“它”穿来穿去的，重上到下，左左右右，来来往往。
3.第一次玩就有新手教程，总共分成19次训练，你会在每次训练里学习到如何操控那些周围事物以及利用你的重力枪解决一些列的问题。是的，那些白色的就是给你的答案，好好看吧，你会发现答案的。
4.虽然是单人，但是玩熟了你就可以去2版玩了，因为基本的都在1版里。
5.没说错的话，这音乐我还是比较喜欢
6.跟随新兵训练的路，你就可以知道怎么玩了，并可以把它分享给你的朋友们
最后，这游戏我在打折期间买的，很划算的。如果现在买的话的确是赚了

我虽然是新手，但是请大师们或者老手们多多关照
Awesome

很好玩，也不難，遇到複雜的關卡稍微想一下就可以通過。
就是玩起來很暈！！！我必須玩一會兒休息一會兒！！！！！
short adorable game and much talks about cake
这个游戏不想多说了，有趣的游戏机制，萌萌的小炮台。还有虽然第一部是反派，却莫名让人有好感的GlaDOS。片尾曲still alive赞！

这款游戏真的很不错，唯一的遗憾是没有开字幕。。。。
GlaDOS从开始就叫我们如何去玩，到最后被我们打败。。。。。我没有开心，我开始有点伤感、我不想这样做，可是剧情就是这样。
关卡都很复杂，非常烧脑，强力推荐！每一关都有新玩法，而后面则是综合性的,最适合那些喜欢挑战的玩家。
Still Alive真的很好听！

Great for all the time....

Portal is definetly a good game for someone that likes puzzles and a funny story. While I finished the story in a single day in two hours, it was still an enjoyable experience. I would suggest getting this at a discount, however, since it is so short. I was able to get it for 99 cents and that's a fair price for a short game, even if it is a classic.
fun game but not long enough
